rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports import bans using neutral language.
The segment reports a trade action ('has banned'), which is Neutral per rule.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports a ban and outbreak detection but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a measure/safeguard ('Botswana has banned the importation') taken after an event, without explicit reassurance.
